verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Draw me close to You, never let me go. I lay it all down again To hear You say that I’m Your friend. You are my desire.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No one else will do ‘Cause nothing else could take Your place. To feel the warmth of Your embrace. Help me find the way, bring me back to You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You’re all I want You’re all I ever needed You’re all I want Help me know You are near.{/lang-eng}
